She Was Tired Of Being Photoshopped, So Here’s What She Did About It.

Grammy Award-winning, singer-songwriter Colbie Caillat released her new EP, Gypsy Heart Side A. Her album’s lead single “Try” makes a powerful statement about beauty ideals.







Like on Facebook Share this with all of your girlfriends by clicking the Share button below. Source: ColbieCaillatVEVO
